### About this guide

This guide is inspired by [Happy Git with R](https://happygitwithr.com/) and the work of [Simon Willison](https://simonwillison.net/) and [Andrej Karpathy](https://karpathy.ai/) on AI-assisted development.

Whether you're an experienced developer exploring AI coding tools or a newcomer discovering programming through LLMs, this guide will help you navigate Git and GitHub in the era of "vibe coding."
